item.title: Knives Out: Celebrities Reveal Plastic Surgery Secrets—But One Procedure Still Taboo
item.description: Knives out: Cosmetic surgery is finally out of the closet, turning actors into evangelists and top doctors into superstars, yet there’s still a very common procedure that nobody wants to talk about.

item.title: Rise of the Machines: Inside Hollywood’s AI Civil War
item.description: The technology is already transforming the industry — and could forever change the entertainment we consume. But the battle to contain it has just begun.
